ygData.subject: RE: Instruments vs. Melee quandry
ygData.msgSnippet: very true.  its all lower guk, sol B, or twinking characters like you said. had a lot of fun with Fire Giants a few nights one week though, all the way up to
ygData.messageBody:
very true. its all lower guk, sol B, or twinking characters like you said.
had a lot of fun with Fire Giants a few nights one week though, all the way
up to and including warlord skarlon. got me the first mithril arms on the
server =) and then the Nagafen kill. but pretty slow since then,
definitely need a Fear repatch and Hate to open. i know a lot of people not
yet 50 are upset about fear too, as the 50s are crowding their space now =)

Shada


> Woohoo. Congrats. Since I started a full time job again recently I
> haven't been able to play long enough to be able to organise
> a party to
> even try. Also, when I do log in, seems like most of my friends are
> either playing second characters or out hunting lower level mobs to
> twink said characters. Since the last fear plane nerfing the amount of
> things for L50 chars to do is pretty dismal.
